name: Batting Cage Manager Simulator
description: This is a simple batting cage manager simulator done for the Jamulator game jam. Collect the batted balls and return them to the machine. Keep your money above $0 for as many pitches as possible! Buy new machines to quickly add to your pitch count, but be careful, each pitch costs you $5. Every 10 pitches, a new customer comes and pays $60, $75,  or $100 to use the slow, medium, or fast machines!
